name: Eredan Arena
storyline:
You know me? I'm Amnezy! The superb arena you can see here is mine. You wonder what you’re doing here? Look at the people all around: they are your new team mates. On the other side of the arena, your enemies are
waiting to fight.
summary:
WHAT IS EREDAN ARENA ?
Eredan Arena is a fast-paced, turn by turn, collectible card game. Here is a list of all its features :

- Accessible and deep gameplay based on dice mechanics
- Duel opponents from around the world in turn by turn, fast-paced games
- Unlock and upgrade cards to make your deck stronger
- Build your team based on specific synergies, counters and strategies
- Climb through the 15 existing leagues at your own pace
- Get rewarded for your progression, your ranking and at the end of each duel
